uvme_analysis_output
uvme_analysis_output

analysis output has two side.  Inner side: inner side the the module's inner processiong. it will call output.send to send packets to the module's outside.

Out side: Outside should connect to a analysis input or a sequencer.

link function should be used to connect output to outside. for example, link output to a sequencer or a input.

------------------
|    module      |
|               ------------------------------------------------------------------
|               |                                                                |
| inner side -> | non-blocking   send()          output         analysis port -> |  out side
|               |                                                                |
|               ------------------------------------------------------------------
|                |
|----------------|
